title: sugar carrot cake
description: If you are avoiding refined sugar, try Mary's take on carrot cake which uses agave syrup and maple syrup as sweeteners.You will need two 20cm/8in cake tins, a piece of muslin or a thin cleaning cloth and a piping bag fitted with a 1cm/½in plain nozzle.
ingredients: 175ml/6fl oz agave syrup (also known as agave nectar)
